author: Xbox
description:
Introducing...No Man's Sky: Relics. Turn your hand to palaeontology in update 5.6, RELICS! Unearth hundreds of unique bones, assemble skeletons to design fossil exhibits, join the community on an expedition to recreate lost creatures, battle against gargantuan stone guardians, and more!

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/no-mans-sky/bqvqtl3pch05

title: No Man's Sky Relics Update Trailer

author: Xbox
description:
Take off to the stars, and adventure!
 
The console game of “EDENS ZERO” will be released on July 15, 2025!  

A 3D Action RPG based on the space fantasy comic/anime “EDENS ZERO” by Hiro Mashima (creator of FAIRY TAIL).

Use the unique characters and embark on an epic adventure through various fields while engaging in fierce battles with powerful enemy characters!

Pre-orders available now!

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/edens-zero/9P2R10RPFR28/0017

© Hiro Mashima / Kodansha, NTV　©Konami Digital Entertainment

author: Xbox
description:
Are you ready for even more benefits?
 
Get in-game benefits with Game Pass in League of Legends, VALORANT, Overwatch 2, Genshin Impact, The Finals, and more of the biggest free-to-play games - including seasonal content drops. 
 
Instantly unlock items like cosmetics, characters, and more to enhance your gameplay. Plus, choose exactly what you want with in-game currency. Whether it’s customization, personalization, or progression – get more with Game Pass.

https://news.xbox.com/2025/03/26/game-pass-free-to-play-benefits

Requires Game Pass Ultimate or PC Game Pass subscription, sold separately. Game catalog varies over time, by region, and by device. Free-to-play games and in-game benefits vary by game and are subject to change. For individual in-game benefit terms, see each game’s benefit offering by launching Xbox on PC.
